item.title: Managed Services
item.dc:creator: jacob
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Managed Services

At Fenway Group, we’re strategists, designers and technologists dedicated to creating outstanding experiences. We build relationships and custom applications that translate your business goals into functional reality.

System Admin Maintenance

12 months of 40 hours per month • Perform core conguration tasks • Work with User Interface (UI) policies, data policies, UI actions, business rules and client scripts • Activate plugins • Add users, groups and roles • Manage data with tables, the conguration management database (CMDB), import sets and update sets • All out of the box applications • Create workow activities and approvals • Congure alerts and notications • View upgrade history and status • Control system access and data security • Create baseline performance metrics • Create reports • Integrate social IT elements and learn best practices

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="5838" img_size="full" img_link_large="" img_link_new_tab=""][vc_column_text]

Development

12 months of 10 hours per month • Enhancement Requests for ServiceNow application development • Remote technical working sessions with your team • Creation of business rules and client scripts • Troubleshooting performance issues • ServiceNow Upgrade Facilitation* • Patch/Upgrade Release Management* *Service provided may be in conjunction ServiceNow

Instance Upgrades/Remediation/Testing

On Request • Moving to any new feature release, including all testing and remediation • Does not include conguration of new features[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
